::: {.callout-note} 

The contents of this course are currently being generated. It will be updated here regularly until the course. 
Please check the [**Schedule**](https://nbisweden.github.io/workshop-data-visualization-r/2505/home_schedule.html) for the proposed topics and updated materials.

:::


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: true


library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
library(fontawesome)
library(htmlTable)

s <- read.table("./contents.csv", sep = ',', header = 1)
r <- rle(s$Main)
row.names(s) <- NULL
cnames <- c('Topic','Lecture','Tutorial')

s %>%
    dplyr::mutate(Lecture = ifelse(is.na(Lecture), Lecture, paste0("<span><a class='marker' href='", Lecture, "'>", fa("fas fa-file-powerpoint"), "</a></span>"))) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(Tutorial = ifelse(is.na(Tutorial), Tutorial, paste0("<span><a class='marker' href='", Tutorial, "'>", fa("fas fa-file-lines"), "</a></span>"))) %>%
    dplyr::select(-Main) %>%
    setNames(cnames) %>%
    addHtmlTableStyle(align = "lcc", align.header = "ccc", css.cell = "padding-right:1em;") %>%
    htmlTable(rnames = FALSE, rgroup = r$values, n.rgroup = r$lengths)
```
